verses.name: Mark 13:1
verses.text: And as he went out of the temple, one of his disciples saith unto him, Master, see what manner of stones and what buildings are here!

verses.name: Mark 13:2
verses.text: And Jesus answering said unto him, Seest thou these great buildings? there shall not be left one stone upon another, that shall not be thrown down.

verses.name: Mark 13:3
verses.text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple, Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately,

verses.name: Mark 13:4
verses.text: Tell us, when shall these things be? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled?
